attributes.action: lobby the Japanese Government in  respect of the Inhumane slaughter of whales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With respect to the other petiions on this site (all of which have been ignored), and following the latest Australian pictures of the Japanese whaling fleet in action,  I/we implore the Prime Minister to bring pressure to bear on the Japanese Government to stop this cruel and inhumane slaughter of whales! There can be NO scientific reason for this slaughter - only the crazed love of killing!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
